product_name: Cannondale Slice Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A sleeveless cycling jersey meant for long rides in warm weather, the women's Cannondale Slice Bike jersey combines great quick-drying performance with a built-in shelf bra for light support. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps keep skin dry to boost comfort on warm days. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Jersey features a deep front zipper and 2 mesh pockets sized for energy gels. The women's Cannondale Slice jersey offers a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: A sleeveless cycling jersey meant for long rides in warm weather, the women's Cannondale Slice Bike jersey combines great quick-drying performance with a built-in shelf bra for light support.
